conversations.description: User asks to find an available date for a downtown ballroom and book it for a corporate gala.
Planner requests catering quotes from a preferred vendor for a 200‑guest wedding.
User adds RSVP entries for new guests and updates attendance status for an upcoming fundraiser.
Assistant drafts and sends invitation emails with personalized RSVP links to a guest list.
User wants a detailed day‑of timeline for a three‑day conference, including setup and speaker sessions.
Planner uploads a signed venue contract PDF to the event document store for future reference.
User asks for a budget breakdown, entering venue, catering, décor, and entertainment costs.
Assistant retrieves the latest service agreement from the audiovisual vendor for a tech summit.
User needs to reschedule a wedding ceremony after discovering a conflict in the venue calendar.
Planner requests reminder emails to be sent to vendors one week before the event start date.
User wants to compare two florist proposals and have the assistant summarize key differences.
Assistant sends thank‑you emails to all attendees after a successful charity auction.
Planner adds a last‑minute guest to the RSVP list and triggers an updated seating chart email.
User asks to lock in a photographer’s contract and receive a copy uploaded to the event folder.
Assistant generates a budget variance report after recent cost updates for a product launch party.
Planner checks venue availability for a beachside resort for a destination wedding in June.
User requests a concise agenda email for speakers, including their presentation slots.
Assistant retrieves the standard catering menu template for a corporate lunch and customizes it.
Planner wants to send a reminder to guests who haven’t responded to the RSVP request.
User asks to add a corporate sponsor’s logo to the event brochure and store the file.
Assistant creates a step‑by‑step checklist for setting up a trade‑show booth.
Planner needs to cancel an external vendor and retrieve a termination clause from the contract.
User wants an email draft to negotiate a discount with a lighting company.
Assistant verifies that a venue is free on the requested dates and books it automatically.
Planner uploads receipts from equipment rentals to keep the expense tracker up‑to‑date.
User asks for a projected cash flow chart based on current budget items for a music festival.
Assistant sends a final run‑through schedule to the event staff an hour before the event begins.
Planner requests a comparison of two banquet halls, including capacity, price, and availability.
User wants to add a VIP guest list and have personalized invitation emails generated.
Assistant pulls the latest insurance certificate from a vendor and uploads it to the event portal.
Planner asks to update the event timeline after a speaker changes their slot.
User wants to send a post‑event survey link to all participants and track responses.
Assistant calculates the total projected cost after adding transportation and accommodation expenses.
Planner needs to send a reminder to the catering team about dietary restrictions for guests.
User asks to generate a printable seating plan based on RSVP confirmations.
Assistant retrieves a venue’s cancellation policy and summarizes key points for the user.
Planner wants to notify all attendees about a rain‑check plan for an outdoor wedding.
User requests to add a new vendor profile for a custom cake designer and pull their standard contract.
Assistant drafts a press release email announcing the upcoming conference and sends it to media contacts.
Planner asks to sync the event agenda with a shared Google Calendar for the whole team.
User wants to confirm that all contracts have been signed and stored before the event deadline.
Assistant sends a gentle follow‑up email to a vendor who hasn’t returned a signed agreement.
Planner needs a quick estimate of last‑minute décor costs for a birthday celebration.
User asks to generate a multi‑day rehearsal schedule and email it to participants.
Assistant uploads a signed liability waiver for a participant and links it to the event record.
Planner wants to create a budget alert that notifies them when spending exceeds 90% of the limit.
User requests a summary email of all vendor contacts, terms, and payment due dates.
Assistant verifies that the chosen venue’s audio system meets the technical specifications for a live band.
Planner asks to generate a checklist for post‑event clean‑up and assign tasks to staff members.
User wants to send a personalized thank‑you note to each speaker with a link to their presentation slides.
Assistant updates the RSVP list after receiving bulk confirmations from a corporate partner.
Planner needs to renegotiate the catering price due to a change in guest count and draft a revised contract.
User asks the assistant to create a timeline for setting up a wedding ceremony and reception on the same day.
Assistant pulls the latest weather forecast and suggests contingency plans for an outdoor event.
Planner wants to email a digital ticket PDF to each confirmed attendee and track delivery status.
